_description: The best use of youth, ascribed to Henry VIII — seven quatrains.

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Lusti yough shuld vs ensuehys mery hart shall sure all rew…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …And that we may ower fauttes amendAn blysse opteyne at ower last end
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated twice for three voices; ends “Amen.”
